content: this entire round work only into the back loop of each previous round stitch 1 3ch then double_crochet into the same stitch the 3ch originated from 2 double_crochet into each of the next two dcs from the previous round 3 double_crochet twice into next double_crochet from the previous round 4 double_crochet into each of the next two dcs from the previous round 5 double_crochet twice into next double_crochet from the previous round 6 skip next double_crochet from the previous round and then double_crochet twice into next double_crochet from previous round double_crochet into each of the next two dcs from the previous round double_crochet 7 twice into next double_crochet from the previous round double_crochet into each of the next two dcs from the previous round double_crochet twice into next double_crochet from the previous round 7 repeat step 6 twelve times 8 slip_stitch into the top of the 3ch made in 1 to complete the round 2 make second repeat of triangles option a or b a offset for all rounds 13 - 16 work only into the back loop of each applicable previous rounds round stitch 13 16 1 commence round 13 in the same stitch that the slip_stitch was made into when completing the previous round 2 work rounds 9 12 as above b not for all rounds 13 -16 work only into the back loop of each applicable previous offset round stitch rounds 1 slip_stitch into each of the next five round 4 dcs then work rounds 9 12 as above 13 - 16 3a optional border single_crochet round for this entire round work only into the back loop of each round 16 stitch 16 1 1 1ch then single_crochet into same stitch slip_stitch from previous round was worked into 2 single_crochet into each stitch following from previous round 3 slip_stitch into the first single_crochet made in step 1 3b optional border crab stitch round for this entire round work only into the back loop of each round 16 stitch 16 1 1 1ch then crab stitch reverse single_crochet into stitch to the immediate right of slip_stitch 2 crab stitch into each stitch around working clockwise reverse 3 slip_stitch into the first crab stitch made in step 1 8
